com.threecrickets.prudence.cache
Class HazelcastCacheTagsMongoDbMapStore<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  com.threecrickets.prudence.cache.HazelcastMongoDbMapStore<K,V>
      com.threecrickets.prudence.cache.HazelcastCacheTagsMongoDbMapStore<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - Key
V - Value
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapLoader<K,V>, MapStore<K,V>
public class HazelcastCacheTagsMongoDbMapStore<K,V>
extends HazelcastMongoDbMapStore<K,V>

A Hazelcast persistence implementation over MongoDB.

The MongoDB connection must be stored as "mongoDb.defaultConnection" in the Component's context.

The MongoDB database will be "prudence" and the collection will be "hazelcast_cache_tags".

TOOD: unfortunately, this class will not be used: MultiMaps do not support MapStore in Hazelcast.

Author:
Tal Liron
